Guide to the Charles E. Bigelow and Bay State Shoe Factory Papers

titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:02 -0400.

did.unittitle: Charles E. Bigelow and Bay State Shoe Factory papers
did.abstract: Personal papers of Charles Bigelow, including family correspondence, photographs, and househould records; as well as business papers for the Bay State Shoe Factory. Includes financial records, factory reports, business correspondence, and legal documents.
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
